name: An Adventure Happen
description:
in a world where it is monsters, a child has the tragedy happen at him?  soon more events occur.  that is when the AN ADVENTURE HAPPEN.

AN ADVENTURE HAPPEN is top quality RPG like the old times!

fight at the EPIC MONSTER!  take visit of MYSTERIOUS LOCATION!  buy the EQUIPMENTS FOR SALE!  there are too many.

do have you what it takes to make the adventure happen?

the control is :

press the ARROW KEY to walk some distance

SPACE BAR is confirm the action

ESCAPE BAR does a cancel or makes the menu transpire
